# Use `bookdown`

Try changing output format in your YAML to a bookdown one for single docs

.pull-left[

```{r echo = FALSE}
library(ymlthis)
yml_empty() %>% 
  yml_output(html_document()) %>% 
  asis_yaml_output()
```

]

.pull-right[

```{r echo = FALSE}
library(ymlthis)
yml_empty() %>% 
  yml_output(bookdown::html_document2()) %>% 
  asis_yaml_output()
```

]
